content:
IServiceRemotingClientFactory Interface

Definition

Defines the interface that must be implemented for providing the remoting communication client factory.

In this Article

public interface IServiceRemotingClientFactory : Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Communication.Client.ICommunicationClientFactory<Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Services.Remoting.Client.IServiceRemotingClient>
